description:
Keep the fun going after the sun winks out with this wee lantern in the tent, adventure van or at home. The Sprout+ comes equipped with and easy to charge battery, meaning less waste for the planet and no more “good enough” batteries for you. Three standard settings and an infinitely adjustable mode, so you can set the perfect mood lighting for any situation. A magnetic mounting system lets you easily pop the lanyard off and loop it around a tent pole or tree branch, then simply click it back into the lantern. Also, a great option when you need a little light to find that key piece of gear in your trunk.

  • 1-button control for 3 brightness modes or infinite adjustability between 0 and 100 lumens
  • Dual power system can use the included USB rechargeable battery pack or 3 AAA batteries if you are away from USB ports (AAAs not included)
  • Moonlight mode in both cool, white and a soft blue light is easy on the eyes
  • Magnetic lanyard system works on metal or can be hung overhead
  • Dimensions are 5 x 6.5cm
  • IPX4 weatherproofing keeps it shining when Mother Nature turns nasty
name: UCO Sprout+ Rechargeable LED Lantern

specs.value: 3 AAA (not included) or rechargeable battery pack (included)
